document_data.name: Urlryn
document_data.mainbody: '''Urlryn''' was a [[drow]] of [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and one of [[Houndaer Tuin'Tarl]] and [[Syrzan]]'s rebel group.
document_data.History:
Urlryn once trained at [[Melee-Magthere]] under [[Ryld Argith]] and was proficient enough that Ryld remembered his name many years later.

During the [[Silence of Lolth]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Urlryn joined Houndaer's group desiring to start a slave revolt. The plot was discovered by Ryld Argith and [[Pharaun Mizzrym]]. When they escaped from the conspirators' building, Urlryn and his fellows hunted them, but Urlryn was killed by his former master.
